body:
You can contact the court if you need help with your application. Court staff can’t give legal advice so you’ll need to [find a legal advisor]({app:urls:url:lawsociety_find-lawyer}) if you have any issues.

Email: [lfc.help@courts.justice.gov.uk](mailto:lfc.help@courts.justice.gov.uk)  
Phone: 020 7411 6689

Courts are open Monday to Friday, 10:00am to 2:00pm
heading: If you need help
